title.value: Commissioning of new rectal applicator using electronic brachytherapy source
title.justification: The title clearly states the main focus of the research which is the commissioning of a new rectal applicator.
title.quote: PO-2166 Commissioning of new rectal applicator using electronic brachytherapy source

extractions.description: The paper discusses the development and testing of a new rectal applicator for electronic brachytherapy to treat rectal carcinoma, aiming to improve patient comfort and treatment accuracy.

type.justification: The study involves hands-on experiments, measurements, and testing of the NRA which is indicative of empirical research.
type.quote: We present results of measured NRA dose rate and dose distribution uniformity.

name.justification: The paper focuses on dosimetry and the physical aspects of radiation therapy which is a key part of medical physics.
name.quote: We determined beam quality of the NRA with Xoft 50 kVp source by measuring HVL with parallel-plate ion chamber (PPIC) under narrow beam geometry.

name.justification: The research is conducted in the context of radiation oncology, specifically concerning treatment for rectal carcinoma.
name.quote: The Xoft Axxent electronic brachytherapy source with 50 kVp miniature X-ray tube is currently used to treat patients with rectal carcinoma by mimicking Papillon approach.

name.justification: The study involves detailed dosimetric measurements which is a subset of medical physics.
name.quote: We present results of measured NRA dose rate and dose distribution uniformity.

name.justification: The EBT3 model GAFCHROMICTM film is used for dosimetric measurements, indicating it is an important dataset for the research.
name.quote: We first performed relative dose measurement using EBT3 model GAFCHROMICTM film for NRA with single source position.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The dataset is used within the scope of this study with no specific referenced paper.
referenced_paper_title.quote: We first performed relative dose measurement using EBT3 model GAFCHROMICTM film for NRA with single source position.
